title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Chicken Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in chick fil a chicken sandwich (440 kcal), plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and tweaks for meals.
assumptions: Original chicken sandwich with boneless breast, pickle, bun; no modifications or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and serving size. Check Chick-fil-A app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A chicken sandwich has 440 kcal, 28 g protein, and 1350 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in chick fil a chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: 440 kcal for the original fried version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Chick-fil-A sandwich?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Chick-fil-A chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: 1350 mg, mostly from breading and seasoning.
Around 320 kcal, lower fat than the original.

faqs.q: Does Chick-fil-A sandwich have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat, but check for updates as recipes change.
